storyInfo:
The Doctor learns of some of Kjerag's history from Kjarr.
During the Holy Hunt, Enya is in conversation with Arctosz when a band of wild beasts comes savaging without warning. Enya is not just fearless in response, but dispatches them personally, wowing all.

attributes.text: The leader of men knelt before Kjeragandr and offered Her the highest regard. Thus asked:
'All who live on these lands worship and revere Your Holiness.
'And so, please tell us, what is our name?
'I have a name for thee. From this day, these lands shall be called Kjerag, and thou shalt be known as the children of Kjerag.

attributes.content: Sir Arctosz.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: —! I'm here. Your orders, Great Saintess?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: No need to be so tense, Sir Arctosz. I don't eat people.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: This is the first time you are participating in the Holy Hunt yourself, Saintess. I am not the only one. Take a look at the warriors around us. With you gracing our presence, we are all tense, eager to put on our best show!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: As the Saintess, I believe participating in the Holy Hunt with the warriors of Kjeragandr my rightful duty.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You make a fine point!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Let's not talk about me. It seems something has been on your mind since the hunt began. If there is anything you would like to ask, please don't hesitate.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Haha... I guess I wasn't going to fool the Saintess.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: If you don't mind, you can think of me as a friend.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And I, too, will think of you as a friend.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Great Saintess...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: In my heart, I see you as a friend, Great Saintess.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: In that case, let us talk as friends.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Very well. Then, if I may speak my mind.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I want to know your thoughts on the whole transfer of powers affair?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: How straightforward.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: We are friends, after all.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: When it comes to battle, the Paleroches are no less impressive than the Browntails and Silverashes. In subterfuge, though? We're no match for them.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hiding machinations and manipulating others? It's not my style.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You are right...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: However, my friend, you will have to forgive me.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Before I answer your question, I must first make sure of something.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Please, go on.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Sir Arctosz, you are a brave, loyal warrior.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I know you as a frank, straightforward individual, but I also know you nonetheless give your matters due consideration.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You say friends should not hide anything from one another. Let me be honest and get to the point.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: —I would like to know why you have been so staunchly against Enciodes's plans to open up to the outside world?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I'm a ruffian, Saintess.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It doesn't matter how much Enciodes boasts about his so-called opening up and how attractive it all is. I don't care about windbaggery and lip service.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: All I care is what he brings.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And I see him bringing waves of unfaithful foreigners gushing into our homes, the destruction of our lands and mountains in the name of expansion, and the children of Kjeragandr losing their faith after working in his territory.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The things he brings to Kjerag are convenient. He rakes in lots of money and has built many big houses on the back of it. I know all that.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: But if everyone takes after him and casts aside faith in the name of prosperity, what will become of our lands?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Kjeragandr ordered the Paleroches to protect Kjerag. As such, I, Arctosz, will not allow anyone to bring it to ruin, however they try!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Now I understand how you feel, Sir Arctosz...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: In that case, it's time for me to answer your question too.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes proposed to turn over all his core lands to me. It was so sudden that it caught me by surprise.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: So you didn't know beforehand?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Indeed, I never expected him to make such a suggestion.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But––
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I don't claim to know understand Sir Enciodes's thought process and how he arrived at the idea of turning all powers over to me. However, if we look at the outcome, I don't think this is a bad turn of events.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: At the Vine-Bear Court, I watch the masses pray to Kjeragandr day in and day out.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: There is one thing that I understand better than Sir Enciodes, and that's the fact that Kjerag has not yet lost its faith.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I suppose, now that this decision has been made, whatever happens from here won't be so easily influenced by any one person.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The unexpected always comes to pass, no?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: If Sir Enciodes hasn't thought of this before, then I must've thought too highly of him.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Fine... whatever the case for everything else, I trust your word on this.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: To tell you the truth, Great Saintess, up until you just spoke, this conversation made me feel as though I had been talking to someone entirely other than the Saintess.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I guess I must be overthinking it.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm saddened to hear how you feel about our conversation.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But I will never deny that Silverash is my name too.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: However, when I became the Saintess, I separated from the secular world. It was the same Sir Enciodes who stripped my name of meaning.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Great Saintess...
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: We can't hold the beasts back any longer, huh...?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: All hands, get ready to hunt!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Saintess portraits, Saintess embroideries, Saintess sculptures!
attributes.name: Merchant A

attributes.content: The symbol of the Kjerag faith! What are you waiting for? Bring Kjeragandr's blessings home with you!
attributes.name: Merchant A

attributes.options: What a huge crowd...;......;I wonder how things are going with Sharp.

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Whoa... that gave me a jump...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Woke you up, huh?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Whoa, your hands are like ice...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: What are you spacing out for? You've been standing there, not moving an inch.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Oh, did that scare you?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Haha, you seem fine to me!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: What are you looking at? Did you catch the Holy Hunt ceremony? Even the Saintess is joining the hunt this time. Everyone here's been looking forward to it!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.options: How did this ceremony come about?;You don

attributes.content: From what I heard, the Vine-Bear Court found in the scripts a couple centuries ago that this was the day Kjeragandr first appeared to us, and so they made this Kjerag's biggest festival.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: As for what to do during the Ceremony...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You see how most people are just enjoying the festivities.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: The Saintess has one other thing to do, though. She has to cleanse the Tschäggättä loot obtained during the Holy Hunt.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: And the specifics of that process... You'll find out later.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Hmm, has anyone ever told you you're pretty sharp...?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: It's true that I get to leave all my work behind at the Court and enjoy the festivities out here.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: But I feel bad whenever I think about how much work the Saintess has, none of which I can help with, in any way.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Besides...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Oh, whatever. It's a festival. Let's not talk about that.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Oh, you're asking just the right person.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: There's probably not a lot of fun things to do... Aside from the markets, nearly everything has to do with Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: If you want to take this chance to learn more about Kjeragandr, though, there is no better time.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Come, let me show you around~
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: This season every year, the devotees who teach and study at the academy come back to the Vine-Bear Court to preach or to give lessons about Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Let's have a listen.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: A millennium ago, our forebears angered Kjeragandr. She vowed to never again protect Kjerag, and a harsh winter befell our lands.
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: Every year, to calm Her fury, the Vine-Bear Court picked the girl with the purest soul to head skyward toward the mountaintop, carrying a bell that represents Her, until the young maiden sacrificed her soul to Her.
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: When She heard the cries of the one hundredth girl, Kjeragandr at long last forgave the people of Kjerag, and the cruel winters came to an end.
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: That was how Kjerag's first Saintess came to be.
attributes.name: Devotee

attributes.content: This again, huh...? Right, I read a different version of this story in the Vine-Bear Court's texts.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.text: Kjeragandr is said to have appeared before the masses as a young girl, and so everyone believed that a maiden
This ritual continued for almost a hundred years. Over time, the people gradually turned against these unreciprocated rituals.
There was a rebellion against the Vine-Bear Court led by a small clan leader whose daughter was chosen to be the Saintess.

And the most dramatic thing about this turn of events is that the Saintess still climbed to the top of Mount Karlan that year, and Kjeragandr regained Her strength after a centuries-long slumber. Hearing the prayers of the Saintess, She awakened.
The signs of Her awakening were so obvious that the people immediately noticed. Their resistance against the Vine-Bear Court came to a close, just like that.

attributes.options: Sounds a lot more realistic.;Sounds like something you saw with your own eyes.

attributes.content: Right? At the same time, it's also a lot more cruel.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: No, no, not at all. I only found the scripture at the Court by chance. It might be a record left behind by someone who was actually there. It could also be nothing more than pure nonsense.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: After all, Kjerag's snowy mounts are known to swallow men whole.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Sir! A large group of beasts has been spotted up ahead!
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: These beasts are unusually brutal. They're attacking our soldiers at the front right now!
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: They're just beasts! There's nothing to be afraid of!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: All of you, stay here and protect the Saintess. Keep your formation and do not panic. Valais, you stay here too.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Everyone else, come with me. We'll back up our brothers up ahead!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Sir Arctosz, wait!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Great Saintess?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I will come with you.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But, Great Saintess, your safety...
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Valais is right. Your safety is what's important here. Please wait for us here. The Paleroche warriors will protect you!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Wait up, Arctosz!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Ratatos...? What are you doing here? I thought the Browntails and the Silverashes were supposed to take their hunts elsewhere?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The Silverashes have left already, but something doesn't seem right about all this. I was going to come give you a heads up before we split... but it looks like there's no need for that anymore.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What do you mean by that?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You mean the unusual pack of beasts up ahead, Madame Ratatos?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Fine observation, Great Saintess.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I don't know the specifics... but I have a bad feeling about this. I only hope that no one is trying to pull anything funny during an occasion as dignified as the Holy Hunt, let alone putting on a show.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Anyway, we should be more careful. For the first time ever, the Saintess is personally gracing us with her presence during a hunt.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You're exaggerating things, Madame Ratatos.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You do have a point, though. Since I am here, I must stand alongside our brave warriors, instead of cowering in the face of danger.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Please, the situation is urgent. Let us talk on the way.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Well then!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: How fortunate is Kjerag that you feel this way, Great Saintess! I won't stop you! Valais, lead the way!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: (Why aren't you here yet, Monch?! The Saintess doesn't personally join the Holy Hunt every day! We have to seize the opportunity to take care of as many beasts in front of her as we can!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (But... what if we hurt the Saintess by accident...?)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Argh, whatever! It's not like that bitch Ratatos would do anything! Worst case, I'll own up to it!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (You must take this chance, Monch!)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: How can these beasts be so fearless?!
attributes.name: Old Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: This definitely isn't normal...
attributes.name: Old Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Here I thought the beasts in the mountains would be scared stiff with the Saintess joining us.
attributes.name: Young Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Looks like things aren't that simple. Guess the Saintess isn't really all that.
attributes.name: Young Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Watch your mouth! The Saintess isn't for you to discuss so nonchalantly!
attributes.name: Old Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Think about what will happen if Sir Arctosz catches you complaining!
attributes.name: Old Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Fine, fine. I get it! He'd chew me out if he heard...
attributes.name: Young Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: As long as you know... Wait, watch out behind—
attributes.name: Old Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: Get down!
A silver arc of light pierces the raging snowstorm before the beast is able to let out its chilling cry.
With the beast's icy fangs mere inches away, its warm, stinking blood is splattered all over the warrior's face.

Slowly, the Kjerag Saintess sets her hand down from her bowstring as she walks toward the source of the commotion. Just as the texts described, she is accompanied by both Browntail and Paleroche fighters.

attributes.text: Even the snowfall comes to a halt in her presence.

attributes.content: Are you hurt?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The... The Saintess...
attributes.name: Young Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: The danger is yet to pass. Stand up, young warrior.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Warriors of Kjeragandr, raise your weapons! Join me in fending off these beasts and completing the challenge posed to us by Kjeragandr!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Young Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: For... For the Saintess!
attributes.name: Young Kjerag Warrior

attributes.content: For the Saintess!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors
